text: John Robert Osmers (23 February 1935 â€“ 16 June 2021) was a New Zealand anti- apartheid activist. He was Anglican Bishop of Eastern Zambia from 1995 to 2002. He was born in Ashburton, New Zealand. Osmers died in Lusaka, Zambia on 16 June 2021 from problems caused by COVID-19, aged 86. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Zambia Category:New Zealand activists Category:Anti-apartheid activists Category:Anglican bishops
title: John Osmers
